title: NY And LA Back2Normal? Girl Scout Cookie Drought 6.16.21
itunes:title: NY And LA Back2Normal? Girl Scout Cookie Drought 6.16.21
description:
In episode 931, Jack and Miles are joined by This Day In Esoteric Political History host Jody Avirgan to discuss GOP refusing to help the Democrats, Republicans being blacklisted for criticizing Trump, New York and Los Angeles getting back to normal, Darnella Frazier being honored with a Pulitzer nod, UFOs, Girl Scouts, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Senate GOP Leader Mitch McConnell On President Biden Judicial Nominees, A New “JCPOA”
  2. White House to Democrats: Get ready to go it alone on infrastructure
  3. A ‘political death warrant’: GOP lawmakers struggle after criticizing Trump
  4. ‘I didn’t take an oath to defend Donald Trump’: Rep. Tom Rice tests whether Republican voters will support a conservative who crossed Trump
  5. Former congressman Dana Rohrabacher breached Capitol police barricades on Jan. 6
  6. Cuomo: New York going back 'to life as we know it' after reaching vaccine threshold
  7. California officially reopens its economy
  8. Teen who recorded Floyd’s arrest, death wins Pulitzer nod
  9. 'Truth embargo': UFOs are suddenly all the talk in Washington
  10. Do We Believe in U.F.O.s? That’s the Wrong Question
  11. Thinner Mints: Girl Scouts have millions of unsold cookies
  12. LISTEN: Hiatus Kaiyote - 'Chivalry Is Not Dead' (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
